description:
Made from pro-stretch fabric with a breathable Polartec® Windbloc® face insert, this neck and face protector offers serious protection for serious snow lovers. The face shield is 98% windproof and sheds snow and rain. Wear it around your neck, or on your face for extra warmth and protection.

  • Made of 88% polyester, 12% spandex
  • Perforated breathing panel on face
  • Shaped bottom provides full coverage and prevents gathering
name: CTR Mistral Neck/Face Protector - Unisex
